com.psddev.dari.util

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends Object
    Converts an arbitrary object into an instance of another class.

    • Method Detail

      • getFunction

        public <F> ConversionFunction<F,Object> getFunction(Class<F> fromClass,
                                           Type toType)
        Returns the function used to convert an instance of the given fromClass to an instance of the toType. - If a direct conversion function is available, it is returned. Otherwise - If inheritable conversion functions are available, the one with the least inheritance distance is returned. Otherwise, - null is returned inheritance distance is the number of Parent->Child relationships between the fromClass asked for and the fromClass of the conversion function.

      • putDirectFunction

                         ConversionFunction<F,?> function)
